text: Berthold Woltze (was born: 24th August 1829 in Havelberg; died 29th November 1896 in Weimar) was a German Genre Painter, Portrait Painter and Illustrator he was a Professor at the Art School, one of his famous works is "Der l√§stige Kavalier" which translated as "The Irritating Gentleman" or "The Annoying Cavalier" == References == == Other websites == * Category:1829 births Category:1896 deaths Category:German artists Category:German illustrators
title: Berthold Woltze
